title: Consultation
description: We discuss your requirements, timeline, and expectations to create a tailored solution.

title: Planning
description: Detailed project plan with milestones, deliverables, and timeline is created.

title: Development
description: Our expert team works on your project with regular updates and progress reports.

title: Testing
description: Comprehensive testing and quality assurance to ensure everything works perfectly.

title: Delivery
description: Final project delivery with documentation, source code, and presentation support.

title: Support
description: Post-delivery support and assistance for presentations and project defense.
